improvements: Increase exposure by +0.50 EV to brighten the overall scene without blowing out the sky
Adjust white balance slightly warmer or selectively desaturate blue tones in the fur to correct the grey/blue cast
Use a healing brush or clone stamp to remove the distracting black rock on the right side
Apply local sharpening and a clarity boost specifically to the dog's fur to enhance texture
Crop slightly from the right side to position the dog's head near the upper-left rule of thirds intersection
critiques.notes: This is a majestic capture with excellent focus and a strong reflection. The primary issue is the flat, overcast lighting which suppresses contrast and gives the white fur a dull blue tint that needs correction to make the subject pop.

improvements: Increase overall exposure by 15-20% to brighten the wet sand and enhance detail in the white fur
Boost contrast by 10-15% to add more definition between the dog and the overcast sky
Enhance vibrance in the blue tones of the sky and water by 20% to create more visual interest
Apply selective sharpening to the dog's face and fur to improve subject clarity
Crop slightly tighter using rule of thirds, positioning the dog in the right third to balance the left-side landscape
critiques.notes: The composition is solid with good placement of the subject, but the flat, overcast lighting creates a somewhat dull image lacking contrast and depth. The white dog blends slightly with the pale sky, reducing impact. Enhanced exposure and color grading would significantly improve visual appeal while maintaining the moody beach atmosphere.
